dresses.name: Pink Ball Gowm
dresses.description: This is a baby pink ball gowm dress that gives princess vibes.This dress is sure to make your wedding day feel like a happily ever after wedding.

dresses.name: White Mermaid Dress
dresses.description: This is a baby pink mermaid dress with a cute trail . It comes with a beautiful lace veil and shoes.

dresses.name: Gold and White Gown
dresses.description: This is a dress guaranteed to make you feel like royalty on your wedding day.It comes accompained with matching jewellery that will tie you whole look together.

dresses.name: Lace Wedding Dress
dresses.description: This is a pure white lace weding dress.It is cote and light guaranteed for comfort and style on your special day

dresses.name: Off Shoulder Wedding Dress
dresses.description: The off shoulder wedding dress is designed to make you feel classy and sexy. It is recommended for those who dnt want the formallity of a wedding gown but still want to look classy.

dresses.name: Long Sleeved Ball Gown
dresses.description: This is a cute ball gown with long sleeves for all the conservative girlies who still want to look good on their wedding day. We got you covered babe!

dresses.name: High Neck Wedding Dress
dresses.description: This is a lace high neck dress with a mermaid design at the bottom and a cute attatched trail that can be taken off or adjusted according to the brides wishes.

dresses.name: Jewelled Dress
dresses.description: This one is for the brides who want to shine on your wedding day. THis dress is sure to make you SINE BRIGHT LIKE A DIAMOND!

dresses.name: Summer Wedding Dress
dresses.description: This light summer dress is perfect for a wedding on the beach or in a flower field.

dresses.name: Floral Wedding Dress
dresses.description: For all the flower loving gitls this dress has flowers embedded in it giving it a cute simple girly vibe.

dresses.name: Short Sheath Dress
dresses.description: THis short sheath dress is comfortable for dancing and partying o your special day.So that you dont have to worry about the weight of a formal wedding gown.

dresses.name: Lace Mermaid dress
dresses.description: This dresses cute design ensures that you show off your curves and have a beautiful trail on your wedding day.

dresses.name: Corset Dress
dresses.description: Wanna show off your cute waist,this dress has got you covered.This off shoulder mermaid corset dress ensures you feel sexy and cute all at one go.

dresses.name: Satin Dress
dresses.description: This ismple dress has a sexy v shaped neck line and also has pockets!!How amazing is that!!!
